promotion: Send messages to others in the room.
description: This is a simple chat tool. It does not do translation. It supports no editing of prior messages. It does not handle short video clips, videos, or files.
rules: Send messages by typing text then clicking 'send'.  All messages show in a transcript window. The window scrolls up.  If you are not at bottom of window, a down arrow appears in bottom left of transcript window meaning there are unseen messages there, and clicking on it scrolls to the bottom immediately.
